thread.title: Shelters would rather euthanise than donate dogs to SAPS - police
thread.title_full: Shelters would rather euthanise than donate dogs to SAPS - police | News24

author: news24.com
title: Shelters would rather euthanise than donate dogs to SAPS - police
text:
Cape Town - Animal shelters would rather put dogs to sleep than donate them toward the policeâ€™s dog unit, Western Cape police have said.
But the Cape of Good Hope SPCA counters that this is to lessen the chances of them being ill-treated.
Provincial police are appealing to the public to donate their dogs to the force after several four-legged crime-fighters retired recently.
Police spokesperson Captain FC van Wyk said the majority of police dogs are donated by the public.
